citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There was a table with detached boards, white plastic from an old feeder, trash, and pieces of wooden
boards on the ground in the goat enclosure. In addition, there were boards on the ground in the fallow deer enclosure.
Premises must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct by ensuring the premises are
kept clean and housekeeping items are removed from the goat and fallow deer enclosures. Correct by February 11, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There was a table with detached boards, white plastic from an old feeder, trash, and pieces of wooden 
boards on the ground in the goat enclosure. In addition, there were boards on the ground in the fallow deer enclosure. 
Premises must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct by ensuring the premises are 
kept clean and housekeeping items are removed from the goat and fallow deer enclosures. Correct by February 11, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
